name: .FFS File Extension
summary: Learn about .FFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created by FME Desktop, an application used for manipulating and converting spatial data; contains "features," which are spatial data sets and objects stored in FME Desktop's format-neutral representation.

content: FFS files are useful for saving data in the native application format so that it can be converted in multiple different ways.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
